title: What's Drophack?
body:
Hi,

I saw a youtube video of a Diamond II player and he says he keeps getting dropped hack, can someone tell me what this is?
Thanks

replies.body: OCE area in gaming in general has been experiencing server issues due to the underwater cables being accidentally severed by different means.   Some of these lag spikes/server based crashes etc have occurred due to rerouting systems have needed to be done, and servers getting overloaded and crashed.   these issues have been occurring in a few games out there.   Some are the companies general probs, some are due to the above statement.  Stupid dragline fishing trawlers.......

Basically it might be one of two cases:
-overloading the individual server so that it shuts down (causing the cancellation of your game, along with 200-300 others)
-justifying your DCs by blaming riot's incompetence and other people's cheats

One is very frequent. The other is punishable by law, but good luck finding the one among a few thousands.
Every now and again there's a security upgrade to make the first one harder.
Um if it was recently it may not have been a drop hack, its bcz oce has been really bad lately... servers shutting off mid game, everyone dcing 2-3 times a match etc
